content:
@Caleb Cartwright kicking a thread off on this

2021-11-27T19:24:42.5629141Z test ignore_path::test::test_ignore_path_set ... ok seems to be running in https://github.com/rust-lang/rustfmt/runs/4342369241?check_suite_focus=true
it does look like CFG_RELEASE_CHANNEL=stable tries to get set
my guess without more investigation is that it's not getting passed into the actual cargo build/test run due to some bash problem, but not sure
i dunno about that older run, but when i look at a more recent one i'm seeing what i'd expect (or closer to it) https://github.com/rust-lang/rustfmt/runs/5210769904?check_suite_focus=true
i could've sworn we had unused imports banned in our own ci but obviously not as that warning has been there for a while
ah, ok, yeah probably looked at too old a run, not sure how I landed on it
in any case sounds like the fix for the future is simple - just -Dwarnings there.
